tables.name: logentries
tables.description: Stores logs of various types such as tasks, meetings, and notes.

fields.name: logentrydatetime
fields.description: The time the log entry was created.

fields.name: logtype
fields.description: Type of log entry (e.g., task, meeting, note).

tables.name: contacts
tables.description: Stores information about individuals, including their association with companies.

fields.name: companyid
fields.description: Foreign key linking to companies table.

fields.name: phone
fields.description: Phone number of the contact in 111.111.1111 format.

fields.name: title
fields.description: Title or role of the contact.

fields.name: city
fields.description: City where the company is located.

fields.name: state
fields.description: State where the company is located.

fields.name: zip
fields.description: ZIP code of the company's location.

fields.name: country
fields.description: Country where the company is located.

fields.name: phone
fields.description: Phone number of the company in 111.111.1111 format.

tables.name: relationships
tables.description: Links log entries with contacts and companies to establish associations.

fields.name: logentry_id
fields.description: Foreign key linking to logentries table.

fields.name: contact_id
fields.description: Foreign key linking to contacts table.

fields.name: company_id
fields.description: Foreign key linking to companies table.

tables.name: logentry_keywords
tables.description: Stores keywords associated with log entries, allowing for normalized and flexible querying.

fields.name: logentry_id
fields.description: Foreign key linking to logentries table.

fields.name: keyword
fields.description: Individual keyword associated with a log entry.
